title: Masaya Koga Website
text:
As an Operations Manager at Ryan Transactional Risk, I specialize in optimizing processes to drive efficiency and performance.
With a background as a Data Operations Associate at CB Insights and experience in sales at Tempus, I bring a versatile skill set focused on streamlining operations and delivering meaningful results.
You can learn more about me on my LinkedIn profile.
You can also view or download my resume.
